title: Owaru Isekai no Arukikata - Novel Updates
tags: Oneshot   Past Plays a Big Role   Tragic Past
author: Kaeruda Ameko   蛙田あめこ
description:
The girl who should had more unreasonable circumstance than anyone else, trusted the woman who was wore out of reality and completely rebellious since the first day they met.

She believed in the woman’s superpower.

Because her powerful power, her skin discolored and she was crying, said she loved her skin.

At a certain night, the woman speak about her life, her regret and her grudge against the world, and when the girl accept all of them, she got hugged.

The woman thought protecting a girl who was much younger than herself was something purer than anything in the world.

That’s why.

That’s why the woman decided.

To destroy this world.

To turn everything in this word into enemies.

With her Miracle Ash superpower — she will absolutely burn The World Tree.>
